TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CornerRadius extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Windows.CornerRadius>

Docs.summary: Represents the radii of a rectangle's corners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class has four properties, , , , and , corresponding to the individual corners of the rectangle. Each is a structure that can be set independently of the others. The radii cannot be negative. ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *TopLeft* value that specifies the radius of the top left corner. *TopRight* value that specifies the top right corner. *BottomRight* value that specifies the bottom right corner. *BottomLeft* value that specifies the bottom left corner. *AllCorners* If only a single value is specified, that measure is applied to ALL of the *TopLeft*, *TopRight*, *BottomRight*, and *BottomLeft* corners of the CornerRadius. > [!NOTE] > Values need not include the decimal point explicitly when specified as a string. The string "1" provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] evaluates to a value of 1.0 when referenced in code. ## Examples The following example shows how to set the value of the property by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-cs[ThicknessStruct#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/ThicknessSamp/ThicknessSamp.cs#1)] [!code-xml[ThicknessStruct#1](~/add/codesnippet/Xaml/ThicknessXAML/default.xaml#1)] [!code-vb[ThicknessStruct#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/ThicknessSampVB/ThicknessSampVB.vb#1)]

Gets or sets the radius of the bottom-left corner.
Docs.value: The radius of the bottom-left corner. The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The radius of the bottom-left corner can be set independently of the other corners of the rectangle.
